• The aim of treatment is to achieve freedom from symptoms such that lifestyle of the individual is not affected.
• Management of asthma in pregnancy does not differ from that in non-pregnant women.
o Beta-2 stimulants (e.g. salbutamol), inhaled and systemic steroids, aminophylline and ipratroprium

• Manage labour and delivery according to normal obstetric principles.
